name: ASTA Black Warrior
description:
Asta and Black Warrior is a Beat Em Up game, Where you will play as anti magic user asta and fight all the evil knights in this horror superhero beat-‘em up games.

Use your black grimoire on a fun retro fighting game where you can show off your karate and kung fu skills to the slendy gang.

Don’t underestimate them though! They are powerful street fighting tub. It’s up to you to punch, kick, smash and knock them all out. Rage is on! Stick to your bat and prepare for a ruthless battle.

Open boxes to discover and equip new weapons and eat bananas to gain more strength. Collect oranges from gangsters and unlock new warriors.

MOBILE GAME FEATURES
- Play with different magic superhero.
- Use different all in one magic.
- Each heroes has their own story.
- Fun and epic fighting games.
